/usr/bin/g++    -Wall -fPIC -std=c++11 -fopenmp -g -DDEBUG     CMakeFiles/oofem.dir/src/main/main.C.o  -o oofem -rdynamic liboofem.so -ldl /opt/OpenBLAS/lib/libopenblas.so /opt/Numerical/parmetis/lib/libparmetis.so /opt/Numerical/metis/lib/libmetis.so /opt/petsc/linux_gcc_openmpi/lib/libpetsc.so -lmpi_cxx -lmpi -ldl /opt/OpenBLAS/lib/libopenblas.so /opt/Numerical/parmetis/lib/libparmetis.so /opt/Numerical/metis/lib/libmetis.so /opt/petsc/linux_gcc_openmpi/lib/libpetsc.so -lmpi_cxx -lmpi -lhwloc -Wl,-rpath,/home/srinath/oofem_new/build:/opt/OpenBLAS/lib:/opt/Numerical/parmetis/lib:/opt/Numerical/metis/lib:/opt/petsc/linux_gcc_openmpi/lib:
